skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saga city radio dot com
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The word "sagacity" means wisdom, deep insight, profundity, and discernment, all of which the Word of God represents and more. One of our objectives is to deliver the kind of Biblical programming that embodies the sagacity of the Word of God.

Sagacity Radio is a listener funded Christian radio station which plays a major role within the non-profit ministry of LifeWord Ministries Worldwide Gospel Media Incorporated. It is by the grace of God that Sagacity Radio was founded by United States Air Force Veteran (Vietnam Era), book author, and Gospel Lay Preacher E. Lawrence Williams. Our primary mission is to help carry out the Great Commission mandated by Jesus Christ when He commanded us, "Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you away, even unto the end of the world. Amen." (Matthew 28:19-20). We are committed to the opportunity granted us by God to spread the Word of God wherever our station can be heard, even to the remotest places on this planet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
